description:
1.  create VM, binding:vif_type  in port is binding_failed
2. delete the VM
we will find the exception: NovaException: Unexpected vif_type=binding_failed
title: Delete VM fail because the port in VM is binding failed

comments.content:
1.  create VM, binding:vif_type  in port is binding_failed
2. delete the VM
we will find the exception: NovaException: Unexpected vif_type=binding_failed
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ran-qunying

comments.content:
@QunyingRan:

Bug skimming result
===================
This bug report doesn't have enough information to do an analysis.
Please update the description and consider using a template [1] which
shows which information is needed.

I change the status of this report to "Incomplete". After you provided
the necessary information, please switch it back to "New".

If you have questions, I'm available in the IRC channel #openstack-nova
under the name "markus_z".

References
==========
[1] https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Nova/BugsTeam/BugReportTemplate
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content:
hi QunyingRan (ran-qunying) 
Can you please let us know the detail information in as required #1 before we set it to New again?

-Eli
